channel.title: OK, I need help with this
channel.description: I am using RicScape client, ok I've added the darkbow (item 7603) to the bows part of the client.java of the server but what I want to know is..how do I make it shoot arrows I know there was a tut on it but, I cannot seem to find it if anyone has a link can they help me please?
